subject: Career
title: The Total Compensation Mindset
description: A fast breakdown of The Total Compensation Mindset for builders.

hook.text: She turned down the $120K offer for the $110K one. Everyone thought she was crazy. But the second had $40K in equity.

buildup.text: Salary is just one piece. Total compensation includes equity, bonuses, benefits, PTO, and growth opportunities.

discovery.text: At senior levels, base salary may be less than 50% of total compensation. Ignoring the rest leaves money on the table.

twist.text: Some benefits have massive hidden value: employer 401K match is free money. Good insurance saves thousands.

climax.text: Always calculate total compensation before comparing offers. A spreadsheet that values each component reveals the truth.

punchline.text: Salary is the headline. Total compensation is the story.

quiz.question: At senior levels, how much of total compensation might base salary represent?
